src:
Mahmud Murodov UFC’dagi ikkinchi jangi bo‘yicha kelishuvga erishdi

06 Nov 2019, 17:05

O‘zbekistonlik yakkakurashchi Mahmud Murodov (23-6, 14 KO) UFC’dagi ikkinchi jangi bo‘yicha shartnoma imzoladi. Bu haqda GoSport xabar bermoqda.


Foto: CzechFighters

Ma’lum bo‘lishicha, Mahmud Murodov UFC’dagi ikkinchi jangini o‘tkazish bo‘yicha kelishuvga erishgan. Jangning aniq sanasi bo‘yicha ma’lumotlar yo‘q. Xabarlarga ko‘ra, mazkur UFC kechasi 2020-yilning boshida bo‘lib o‘tadi. Shuningdek, Murodovning bo‘lajak raqibi ham noma’lum.
Eslatib o‘tamiz, Mahmud UFC’dagi debyut jangini 28-sentabr kuni o‘tkazgandi. Murodov Kopengagenda bo‘lib o‘tagan UFC Fight Night 160 kechasi doirasida italiyalik Alessio di Kirikoga (12-4, 9 KO) qarshi oktagonga chiqib, uch raund yakunlariga ko‘ra, ochkolar evaziga g‘alaba qozongandi.

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
Makhmud Murodov has reached an agreement for his second fight in the UFC

06 Nov 2019, 17:05 PM

Uzbek tennis player Mahmud Murodov (23-6, 14 KO) has signed a contract for his second fight in the UFC. About it reports GoSport.


Photo: CzechFighters

It is reported that Mahmud Murodov has reached an agreement for his second fight in the UFC. No exact date of the fight. According to reports, this UFC party will be held in early 2020. Murodov's future rival is also unknown.
Mahmoud made his UFC debut on September 28. Murodov competed against the Italian Alessio di Cirico (12-4, 9 KO) during the UFC Fight Night 160 in Copenhagen and won the points in three rounds.

For more on football and sports news, subscribe to @ river_sport!
